function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective vaccines for vector-borne diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Investment in research and development of effective vaccines, and implementation of alternative control methods","Technologies":"Vaccine development, advanced vector control methods","People":"General population, particularly in regions affected by vector-borne diseases","Owner":"Government health agencies, pharmaceutical industry"},{"Description":"Complacency and lack of investment in vector control","Impact":"Resurgence of vector-borne diseases leading to epidemics","Mitigation":"Sustained and comprehensive vector control programs, investment in surveillance and monitoring","Technologies":"Vector surveillance technologies, advanced control methods","People":"General population, particularly in regions affected by vector-borne diseases","Owner":"Government health agencies, international organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of political will and central coordination","Impact":"Failure to effectively reduce disease incidence and control vectors","Mitigation":"Advocacy, political support, cross-border collaboration, and substantial donations","Technologies":"Advocacy tools, coordination platforms, cross-border collaboration tools","People":"Government officials, international organizations, advocacy groups","Owner":"Government health agencies, international organizations, advocacy groups"}]}
